function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Frequent consumption of alcohol could potentially increase the health problems.","Impact":"Increased risk of health problems and decreased immune response, making individuals more susceptible to contagious diseases like COVID-19.","Mitigation":"Encourage moderation in alcohol consumption and promote healthy lifestyle choices.","Technologies":"N/A","People":"General population","Owner":"Government"},{"Description":"Thermal scanners are not an effective method for diagnosis of COVID-19, as it can only detect fever and infected individuals may not have fever yet.","Impact":"Failure to detect asymptomatic or presymptomatic infected individuals, leading to potential spread of the virus.","Mitigation":"Use alternative testing methods, such as PCR testing, and rely on symptom monitoring and contact tracing.","Technologies":"PCR testing technologies, contact tracing applications","People":"Healthcare professionals, government authorities","Owner":"Healthcare institutions, government"}]}
